amendment.description: An amendment to first reduce and then increase, funding for Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, by $3,543,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to first reduce and then increase, funding for Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, by $3,543,000.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Lujan Grisham (NM) amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A023) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham (NM).
